name: Project Ecosys
description:
This game was made by EPITA students as part of the SCIA (AI and machine learning) major.

It is a simulation game in which the player must build power plants and energy storage facilities in order to supply the ever increasing power demand.

Each available building has several characteristics such as its power output, the terrain types it can be built on, its environmental impact. The player has to chose wisely what to build, where and when.

This game was made using the Unity Engine v5.3 in four months.

The game comes with a state of the art document giving an overview of power grid simulations in game, real-life power plant types, and power consumption in the world.

This project uses modified assets from game-icons.net that were released under CC BY 3.0 License.

3D Models by Antoine Chassin.
